headline: $266 Bn Tiles Market Outlook to 2030: Growth Projected in Emerging Markets Like Asia and Africa, Fueled by Urbanization and Infrastructure Investments
summary: The tiles market is poised for growth in emerging markets like Asia and Africa, fueled by urbanization and infrastructure investment. Eco-friendly tile demand is rising as consumer preferences shift toward sustainability, offering manufacturers opportunities to innovate and capture environmentally conscious markets.Dublin, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Tiles Market Outlook to 2030" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.The Global Tiles Market was valued at USD 266 b
